! parse
expectError 'The second parameter must be a string or a pointer to a named struct.'
err 'Params must be a struct type'

-- svc/svc.go --
package svc

import (
    "context"
    "encore.dev/beta/auth"
)

type Params int

//encore:authhandler
func MyAuth(ctx context.Context, p Params) (auth.UID, error) { return "", nil }
